text: Lilián Annette Garcia (born August 19, 1966) is an American ring announcer, singer, and podcaster. She works for the Raw brand of the professional wrestling promotion WWE. She also announces for the Professional Fighters League (PFL). In 2007, Garcia released an album titled, ¡Quiero Vivir!, followed by an EP called My Time in 2012. == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Professional wrestling announcers Category:Singers from South Carolina Category:Sportspeople from South Carolina
title: Lilian Garcia
